channel.title: All clients i run keeps closing?
channel.description: idk all clients i run just always end up closing like 30 seconds after running

item.title: All clients i run keeps closing?
item.dc:creator: @1nsanepkz 1nsanepkz
item.description:
@1nsanepkz wrote:

[quote=“Sexy-Vampire, post:5, topic:366294”]umm its not windows 7 computers is the 64 bit os vista 64 bit dose the same thing all he needs to do is
edit the run bat to somerhing like this

@echo off
title Exion Client
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1024m client 0 0 highmem members 0
pause

red is for the jkd path blue is depending on the client gui[/quote]

Thanks This helped

Read full topic

item.title: All clients i run keeps closing?
item.dc:creator: @Sexy-Vampire Sexy-Vampire
item.description:
@Sexy-Vampire wrote:

umm its not windows 7 computers is the 64 bit os vista 64 bit dose the same thing all he needs to do is
edit the run bat to somerhing like this

@echo off
title Exion Client
“C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jre6\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1024m client 0 0 highmem members 0
pause

red is for the jkd path blue is depending on the client gui

Read full topic
item.source: All clients i run keeps closing?

item.title: All clients i run keeps closing?
item.dc:creator: @drubrkletern drubrkletern
item.description:
@drubrkletern wrote:

  1. Ok First you need to download this - http://uppit.com/v/REKLK274

2.Open that up and click Windows 7 Coverter

3.Then You will see a line that says ( Batch File: ) Click the ( … ) on that line then a brows will pop up and go to your client folder and click your .bat that you use to run your client.

4.Then push compile.

5.Now your done! go back to your client folder and if you have a windows 7 computer you can play 317’s now and it wont crash the client.
credits to locksmin
use the “application” not the “batch” file to play with your client

Read full topic
